full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I 'JAM DBYANGS SMRA BA'I SENG GE'I BSTOD PA MCHAN GYIS 'GROL BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,CES RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS SMRA BA'I SENG GE LA BSTOD PA SNYAN DNGAGS KYI TSIG SBYOR ZAB CING BRLING BAS NYE BAR BCINGS PA MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA 'DI NYID KYI TSIG DON MCHAN GYIS CUNG ZAD BKRAL BA 'DI NI, BSHES GNYEN MKHAS PA DU MA'I ZHABS PAD YUN RING DU BSTAN PA'I MANG THOS ^BLO BZANG BSTAN RGYAN DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
